channel.title: AmerisourceBergen on FinanClub

item.title: 1140 WBA
item.description: score:1140 Chances: Walgreens Boots Alliance sold some AmerisourceBergen Corp’s shares for about $1.85 billion, further cutting its ownership in the drug distributor, and plans to use the proceeds to pay down debt and for general corporate purposes. Walgreens is offering flu and respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) vaccination appointments nationwide, which could attract customers and contribute to its revenue.
